protocol.name: P-GSE52669-1
protocol.text: Microarray data were extracted from scanned GeneChip images and analyzed by use of Microarray Suite version 5.0.1. Target value (TGT value) was set to 500 global scaling. ID_REF =  VALUE = Signal ABS_CALL = indicating whether the transcript was present (P), absent (A), or marginal (M) DETECTION P-VALUE =

protocol.name: P-GSE52669-2
protocol.text: Seedlings were grown om MS medium for 15 days at 22 °C with a cycle of 16 hr of light and 8 hr of darkness.

protocol.name: P-GSE52669-3
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted using the RNeasy Plant Mini Kit (Qiagen) according to the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE52669-4
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA was prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol.

protocol.name: P-GSE52669-5
protocol.text: The Affymetrix Arabidopsis ATH1 genome array GeneChips were used and hybridization, washing, and staining were carried out as directed in the manufacturer’s manual.

protocol.name: P-GSE52669-6
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using HP GeneArray Scanner G2500A.
